thread.title: Debra Bartholomeusz
thread.title_full: KISA phone reviewed by Debra Bartholomeusz

author: Debra Bartholomeusz
title: Debra Bartholomeusz
text: I got the KISA for my 88 year old father who has difficulties with "normal" mobile phones. Its brilliant!!!! Very easy for him to use and loud enough for him to hear (he has hearing difficulties). I work with disabled adults and have a young man with down syndrome who recently got a KISA also. He is very proud of his new phone and seems to be getting the hang of using it very quickly. Highly recommend this product.
